title: this is the second time i have brought a champ and its been disabled
body: why is riven disabled and theres no notice saying she fkn is. gosh i bust my ass off getting her and now i have to wait ffs man put somthing up saying which champs are disabled. fkn joke man

replies.body: Can you buy fizz next please?

nice man, tell me more pls? http://imgur.com/7mx19f0

it's ok, you only made post 12 hours after they announced

the only reason y i posted this is because theres nothing that says shes been disabled on the game, neither does it say on there own website. kind of bs if u ask me, they have a post about corki but wheres riven, thats all im sayin
shouldve bought a balanced champion like {{champion:50}} or {{champion:99}}

i found a link to the updates, thanks guys, for nothing

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce
god whenever people talk about playing riven........

It's Riven, the bug that's caused her to be disabled is the fact she causes players to randomly post offensive messages and disconnect, giving the error "GG AFK"

Trust me, I'd rather have it disabled than go through the process of disconnecting due to riven bugs
